Material used.Material Name: HEK293T cells transiently transfected with plasmids encoding LRPPRC variants

Readout description.Result Description: Relative protein expression was decreased by 40% for the variant NM_001364529.3:c.2847A>G compared to wildtype.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent biological replicates were performed.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRPPRC was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% relative to wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 60% relative to wild-type.
